00041

00048 typedef struct {
00049     struct list_head list; 
00050     uint8_t drive_no; 
00051     uint16_t idn; 
00052     ec_al_state_t al_state; 
00053     uint8_t *data; 
00054     size_t mem_size; 
00055     size_t data_size; 
00056     ec_direction_t dir; 
00058     ec_internal_request_state_t state; 
00059     unsigned long jiffies_sent; 
00061     uint16_t error_code; 
00062 } ec_soe_request_t;
00063
